presentation.name: Hey! I'm
presentation.stack: My currently stack is ReactJS, React Native, Flutter, Django and NodeJS

agnesEscola.description: This app was developed as the 7th semester project of my graduation. It is an extension of the AGNES app, aimed at helping trans women find schools that are aligned with respect for the rights of trans people.

agnes.description: This application was developed for the course Advanced Topics in Graphic Interface Design. The aim of the application is to provide a support network that connects trans women high school students with their schools. Through the app, they have various tools available to communicate, such as posts from other students, reporting to the school, among others

emergency.description: This application was developed for the course Programming for Mobile Devices. The aim of the application is to save emergency contacts in the system that can be dialed quickly.

smdCarpool.description: This app was developed as the 3rd semester project of my graduation. The aim of the application is to be used to manage rides for students on the Systems and Digital Media course at the Federal University of Cear치. In it, drivers and passengers can register to carry out this partnership.

notitas.description: This app was developed as the 2nd semester project of my graduation. The aim of the application is to be used as a creative resource for children to create songs in the Music class at the University Unit for Early Childhood Education (UUNDC).

satyr.description: This game was developed as the 1st semester project of my graduation. The theme of the game revolves around Satyr, a satyr defender of nature who awakens to fight the Omega corporation, which has been clearing forests for evil purposes.

suma.description: In this role, I develop applications for web and mobile platforms, using Flutter and React, and integrate with REST APIs and PostgreSQL databases. I also take part in the entire development cycle, from requirements analysis to testing and deployment.

devari.description: At Devari Tecnologia, I was involved in creating web and mobile applications. I used a diverse range of technologies to develop innovative and functional solutions.

iplanfor.description: During my time as an IT intern at IPLANFOR, I actively contributed to media development, process diagramming and documentation production.

tech.institutionName: Federal Institute of Education, Science and Technology of Cear치

bach.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Systems and Digital Media
